releases.title: Major UX, Scanner, and PWA Update
highlights: Introduced native modal support for smoother in-app flows.
Redesigned receipt and QR scanner flows with better mobile-first UI and clearer actions.
Added richer scan history UX with improved filtering, exports, and visual states.
Delivered broad UI enhancements across dashboard, container layouts, and settings navigation.
Added payment method integration for faster transactions.
Upgraded PWA metadata and manifest icons (192/512/maskable and Apple icon) for better install experience.
Added a dedicated Release Notes page and linked it from About settings.
Shipped additional quality, stability, and performance improvements.
